txt.en: 'We must keep safe the artifacts of ages past, [placeholder]. Studying these relics gives insight to the untold legends of our forefathers, which might otherwise become lost.\n\n'I have information that one such object, a mythical shield, was last seen in Uflûmp-mur, just a short distance east of The Door to the Clouds. The goblins would have a difficult time destroying such a sturdy shield, so I am hopeful it may still be found there.'
'What a wonderful find this is, a true treasure of the dwarves. Thank you, [placeholder]. The safe-guarding of this shield will ensure that the legend of our craft does not fade from knowledge.'
'Uflûmp-mur is just a short distance to the east. The goblins will have difficulty in destroying such a remarkable shield, but perhaps they will have discarded it nearby.'
Listein has asked you to recover a relic of ages past, in nearby Uflûmp-mur.
You have collected the ancient shield
Find the ancient shield in Uflûmp-mur

Uflûmp-mur can be found at the small outpost found at the entrance to Zirakzigil in Durin's Way.\n\nListein has asked you to head east to Uflûmp-mur to find an ancient shield, so that he may learn what untold legends it holds.
Return the shield to Listein at the entrance to Zirakzigil
The Door to the Clouds is just west of Uflûmp-mur, at the entrance to Zirakzigil in Durin's Way.\n\nYou have found the ancient shield, and should return it to Listein for safe-keeping.
